title: Mousing over Characters In-Game
body:
Every time my cursor hovers over a minion, I get some sort of huge blue/red box, depending on what team I'm in. This box really bothers me, and it sometimes interferes with my farm, since I can't correctly gauge the hp of the minion.
It's even worse when my cursor goes over huge characters, because at that point, the character box just blocks the damn screen.
An example for that case would be with Baron: whenever my cursor goes over Baron, his character box covers the entire pit, and I can't see anything.
Does anyone else have this problem? Can I fix this?
